altTitles.ja: けいおん! アンソロジーコミック

description.en:
An anthology comic of K-On! by various mangaka.

---
**Volume 1**
Cover: [Kokonoka](https://mangadex.org/author/1eca18af-0db1-42f0-9f19-3ec5c5b2a356)
Back cover: [Hoppege](https://mangadex.org/author/cf3951d0-87cc-4e5d-bf11-cb3c4d7f6781)
Cover 4-koma & manga: [Toto Nemigi](https://mangadex.org/author/2699afa4-a2e2-4411-90b8-69e6019e34ed)
Title page illustration: [Iwami Shouko](https://mangadex.org/author/96a14d65-d72f-453b-8738-dac82d1aaddf)
Color illustrations: [Sou](https://mangadex.org/author/add5dc38-6e9a-458d-8fa9-87983c292027), [Marimo](https://mangadex.org/author/f89c8878-5145-45e6-bfc8-88019be6e469), [Shiba Yuusuke](https://mangadex.org/author/312b9dee-706a-4e93-a5ba-27ec8e6e9aad), [Toto Nemigi](https://mangadex.org/author/2699afa4-a2e2-4411-90b8-69e6019e34ed), [Taichi Murata](https://mangadex.org/author/b3c0f259-6277-4a11-9bc0-cf059540969f), [Kanikama](https://mangadex.org/author/ce6d0c08-c364-425c-a23f-ca1090870501)

**Chapters**:
1. **To-Sen!** by Mikami Komata
2. **Nyan-On!** by Kaduho
3. **Poets From Hell** by Daioki
4. **RitsuMio Nodoka?** by Sakura Hanpen
5. **Tsumugi's Nice Day** by Bakutendou
6. **We Are Crazy** by Hoppege
7. **SawaNodo!** by Suzushiro Seri
8. **W-box** by Risa Risa
9. **Operation Dream Scouting** by Araki Fuu
10. **K-ON!** by Shigatake
11. **Autumn Girls Sweet Home** by ms
12. **Azu-Nyan** by Tamaoka Kagari
13. **Murder!** by Haruna Mao
14. **Hirasawa Family Circumstances** by Nonohara Chiki
---
**Volume 2**
Cover: [Ushiki Yoshitaka](https://mangadex.org/author/68a3486d-daa3-4289-8a8a-aa970af4bf24)
Back cover: [POP](https://mangadex.org/author/7e614ea1-0d8d-479d-a475-fcaa40655ef3)
Cover 4-koma & manga: [Arai Cherry](https://mangadex.org/author/1e369209-2934-45e4-a02a-47812ecf08ab)
Title page illustration: [Kuroda bb](https://mangadex.org/author/b8327a2b-a285-4a9a-b124-f3be558741d1)
Color illustrations: [Simadoriru](https://mangadex.org/author/bf9520c3-04d0-4f2d-91a2-635909732e08), [Shiro](https://mangadex.org/author/698fd37e-ac3e-40ed-915b-58ddee1a9bb6), [Hota.](https://mangadex.org/author/034b9d81-4114-4e45-bb52-08722ad49a5e), [Dasoku Sentarou](https://mangadex.org/author/0f61c4bc-0814-4d31-9485-4e38a151429e), [Kaneko Masaru](https://mangadex.org/author/c80495ca-19ae-46c3-8253-7e7c85ca80a3), [Nilitsu](https://mangadex.org/author/da29139f-5c8a-4c91-a99c-6cd22b5518f3)

**Chapters**:
1. **Formerly and Newly Elected! Student Council Presidents** by Mikage
2. **The Blues Sisters** by Hoppege
3. **Hallelujah!** by Harukaze Mika
4. **Light Music Club's Club Room** by Imu Sanjo
5. **Tea Time!** by Purapa
6. **Girls' Talk!** by Shima Tokio
7. **The Second Light Music Club** by kashmir
8. **Maybe K-ON!** by Arai Cherry
9. **Azusa's Plan** by Sakura Hanpen
10. **Shamisen!** by Kobayashi Tetsuya
11. **Un-Tan!** by Hara Yui
12. **Transfer!** by Nekotoufu
13. **Flute Blowing Time** by Kobayashi Tetsurou
---
**Volume 3**
Cover: GotoP
Back cover: Torishimo
Cover 4-koma & manga: [Toto Nemigi](https://mangadex.org/author/2699afa4-a2e2-4411-90b8-69e6019e34ed)
Title page illustration: [CUTEG](https://mangadex.org/author/7cf2ec07-fe50-4040-b4e6-e0f043a831e3)
Color illustrations: [ms](https://mangadex.org/author/2d57adfc-12c8-455c-969c-b2029798a520), eco*, [Fuyuno Haruaki](https://mangadex.org/author/de44980d-8430-4c0b-94a7-58ced90d089a), [Hatori Niwatori](https://mangadex.org/author/8a7a2994-9a51-4ff7-aacd-43f576dc4e71), [Manami Tatsuya](https://mangadex.org/author/904b2f33-467b-4a57-ae0d-2c2a762eca29), [Hara Yui](https://mangadex.org/author/60f69905-13da-42a5-9b2f-0571fcd567c2)

**Chapters**:
1. **Great Queen of Forgetfulness** by Iwami Shouko
2. **NodoSawa** by Suzushiro Seri
3. **Stranded!** by Komusou
4. **Air** by Konishi Aki
5. **K-ON!** by Tamaoki Benkyo
6. **Club Room T-a-lk** by Purapa
7. **Ghost-ON!** by hajime
8. **Gachi-ON!** by Yoshimura Kana
9. **Ui-chan Does Her Best!** by Gengorou
10. **Club President For A Day!** by shige
11. **Let's Go For Some Soba** by Nagumo.
12. by Iwami Shouko
13. by Tamaoka Kagari
14. **Nodoka-cha~an!** by Serebi Ryousangata 
15. by Moriki Takeshi
16. by Hashimoto Shin
17. by Chinjuu Moririn
18. by Miso Oden
19. by Dasoku Sentarou
---
**Volume 4**
Cover: [Shimotsuki Kinuhaze](https://mangadex.org/author/427196b3-fdad-4ec4-911b-59b337df7fc1)
Back cover: [Muririn](https://mangadex.org/author/d6e4a0c7-fc92-4221-aac9-cfa98875ab32)
Cover 4-koma: [Daioki](https://mangadex.org/author/222a8fc4-d45d-41dc-b448-0568a83a014e)
Inside cover manga: [Dowman Sayman](https://mangadex.org/author/3619fb4c-2c89-46e7-a82c-cec18df43a20)
Title page illustration: [Hyuga Azuri](https://mangadex.org/author/e792a7f6-027b-4e17-9ad6-570a79a3792e)
Color illustrations: Fujishima, [Sugano Manami](https://mangadex.org/author/7a93d9a3-166c-496d-95fc-ff1fbbd1dd77), [Mago](https://mangadex.org/author/262eed06-0e25-4d3f-8c02-0d5bac4de5d8), Doa, Sakuya Tsuitachi, [Nilitsu](https://mangadex.org/author/da29139f-5c8a-4c91-a99c-6cd22b5518f3)

**Chapters**:
1. **Underclassmen** by Sakayama Shinta
2. **Good Bye!** by Hota.
3. **Ricchan's 12am Plan** by Mizu Asato
4. **Afterschool Without Tea Time** by Hiro
5. **Operation Dream** by Rioshi
6. **Azu-Nyan and Mysterious Yui-senpai** by Yuzuki Gao
7. **Club President Azusa!** by BeLL
8. **Azussan** by Shiba Yuusuke
9. **Hirasawa Sisters' Magnificent Scheme** by Koi
10. **...enough to get into fights?** by Mitsuki Meia
11. by Kito
12. **Noseblled-Prone Light Music Club** by Cloba U
13. by Haruna Mao
14. by Kobayashi Tetsurou
15. **Fake Mugi** by Imu Sanjo
16. **LMAO of An-chan the Music Store Clerk** by Shirayuki Shion
17. by Sanada Ikki
18. **JWU!** by Mikage
---
**Volume 5**
Cover: Sazanami Chima
Back cover: Ixy
Cover 4-koma & manga: [Suzushiro Seri](https://mangadex.org/author/535ebed2-4702-4e77-8e61-4272c740b176)
Title page illustration: nauribon
Color illustrations: subachi, [Kotamaru](https://mangadex.org/author/dd015357-05d2-42bb-bd8a-c5fe09334bff), [pinePA](https://mangadex.org/author/62a3bb6c-c8dc-4bb0-95b4-351060267183), Hatoharu, Mosuko, Asagiri

**Chapters**:
1. **The Afterschool Goes On!** by Hara Yui
2. **Afterschool Mille-feuille Time** by Tachi
3. **Go What Go What?!** by Nishiuri Warito
4. **Sunday** by Yatosaki Haru
5. **Guitar With You** by Kinniku Tarou
6. **No Club Can Beat The Light Music Club!!** by Arata Iri
7. **Afterschool Case File** by Take Shinobu
8. **Flying Azusa** by Kounosu Satori
9. **King's Ice Cream** by Usume Shirou
10. **Yui's Holiday** by Kanikama
11. **Azusa's "I'll do it by myself"** by Matsuda Shima
12. **Azu Returns The Favor** by Kamonari
13. **Little Sister** by Nozomi

**Alt names**:
美月めいあ

**Alternative Names:**
Douman Seiman
Iijima Susumu
飯島進
Dowman Sayman

**Birth:** March 7
**Years active:** 1993-Present
**Hometown:** Chiba, Japan

**Circle:** 
G Kun Dow (ジークンドー)
Kiheitai (畸兵隊)

His current art style was directly influenced by Mike Mignola (Dowman is a fan of Hellboy).

An avid fan of horror movies (the witches in Voynich Hotel were named after an obscure Italian horror trilogy). After graduating from a design vocational school, he made his debut in the publishing section of BANDAI drawing manga for videogame anthologies.

His pen name is based on the two legendary onmyouji, Abe no Seimei and Ashiya Doman.

**Circles**:
BAKUTENDOU (爆天堂)
Expensive Noise
SYGNAS

**Passed away on May 25, 2018**.

**Circle**: Propeller (プロペラ)

**Circles**:
Dropwort Bell
Haato no Domannaka (は~とのどまんなか)
